original_text: As soon as he had seen the nose ring, and the bracelets on his sister’s arms, and had heard Rebekah tell what the man said to her, he went out to the man and found him standing by the camels near the spring.
korean_text: 그의 누이의 코걸이와 그 손의 손목고리를 보고 또 그의 누이 리브가가 그 사람이 자기에게 이같이 말하더라 함을 듣고 그 사람에게로 나아감이라 그 때에 그가 우물가 낙타 곁에 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: As soon as he had seen the nose ring
and the bracelets on his sister's arms
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 누이의 팔에 있는 팔찌들을

sentences.original_text: what the man said to her
he went out to the man
and found him standing by the camels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 낙타 곁에 서 있는 것을 발견했다
